# tdid

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

These R functions calculate triple difference-in-differences (TDID) using double-robust estimators. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of tdid from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` {r}
install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("dorleventer/tdid")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tdid)
## basic example code
```
